authors.author: Fanny J. Crosby George C. Stebbins

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: Calling today, calling today, newline Jesus is calling, newline Is tenderly calling today.

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Jesus is tenderly calling thee home newline Calling today, calling today. newline Why from the sunshine newline Of love wilt thou roam newline Farther and farther away?

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Jesus is calling the weary to rest newline Calling today, calling today. newline Bring Him your burden newline And you shall be blest; newline He will not turn you away.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Jesus is waiting; O come to Him now newline Waiting today waiting today. newline Come with your sins; at His feet lowly bow, newline Come and no longer delay.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Jesus is pleading; O list to His voice newline Hear Him today, hear Him today. newline They who believe on His name shall rejoice. newline Quickly arise and away.
